definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: Their perspectives and priorities were not in sync with their actions.
sentences.chinese: 他们的行动与他们的远景规划和优先级考虑不一致。

sentences.english: Henry ford envisaged an important future for the motorcar.
sentences.chinese: 亨利福特为汽车设想了光明的远景。

sentences.english: This discovery opens up new vistas of research for biologists.
sentences.chinese: 这一发明为生物学家展现了新的研讨远景。
远景，热情，是我们的使命。

sentences.english: It makes a longrange evaluation for oil-bearing and predicts the right area for exploration.
sentences.chinese: 最后，进行了含油气远景评价和勘探有利区块预测。

sentences.english: Software Description: About Seashores Screen Saver, The Seashores Screen Saver shows spectacular images of ocean vistas.
sentences.chinese: 这个海岸屏幕保护程序显示海洋远景的壮观的照片。

sentences.english: It makes a longrange evaluation for oil-bearing and predicts the right area for explo…
sentences.chinese: 最后，进行了含油气远景评价和勘探有利区块预测。

sentences.english: Primary halo is very effective to detect the deep mineralization of ore deposits.
sentences.chinese: 原生晕分析是研究矿床深部矿化远景的有效手段。

sentences.english: Almost all businesses have a mission statement and a vision statement.
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有的商业行为都有任务与远景声明。

sentences.english: I will be the expression of Christ Michael Aton's vision for this planet.
sentences.chinese: 我将会是基督迈克艾顿对地球远景的表达。

sentences.english: It is estimated that China has 4000 billion tons of potential primary energy reservation.
sentences.chinese: 中国远景一次能源资源总储量估计为4万亿吨标准煤。

sentences.english: Although the science and technology creates the new life the prospect to direct the person daydream, fire imagination.
sentences.chinese: 固然科技创造新生存的远景引人遐思，令人向往。

sentences.english: Faith is like the radar that sees through the fog-the reality of things at a distance that the human eye cannot see.
sentences.chinese: 信仰象透视迷雾的雷达，能够洞悉肉眼难辨的远景。

sentences.english: Your long-term outlook for earning money is actually excellent.
sentences.chinese: 你赚钱的长期远景其实非常好。

sentences.english: Covetousness can never see the big picture.
sentences.chinese: 贪婪从来不会让人看到远景。

sentences.english: Second, a vision needs to be developed, which means a vision statement linked to the business strategy.
sentences.chinese: 第二步就是要发展一个和企业战略相挂勾的远景罗。

definition: to get a bird's-eye view/bird's-eye view/broad overview
real scene (not set up or posed)/real location (not a film studio set or theater)/live action (not animation)
bird's-eye view/see also 俯瞰圖|俯瞰图[fu3 kan4 tu2]
bird's-eye view/see also 鳥瞰圖|鸟瞰图[niao3 kan4 tu2]
rendering (visual representation of how things will turn out)
